name: Garaji FZ-LLC
description: Developer of an automobile servicing platform designed to facilitate car repairing solutions comfortably. The company's platform provides users the information on garages, checks ratings, and availability, it also compares real-time prices, allowing users to choose from alternative service centers for their vehicles.
